statements: DELETE FROM communication_logs WHERE sender = 'Alice' AND recipient = 'Bob';
DELETE FROM communication_logs WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND sender = 'Alice';
DELETE FROM CommunicationLogs_government_entities WHERE entity_name = 'Department of Health';
DELETE FROM CommunicationLogs_government_entities WHERE message_text LIKE '%emergency%';
DELETE FROM communication_logs WHERE agency_id = 1 AND government_id = 1;

DELETE FROM relief_agencies WHERE agency_name = 'ABC Relief Agency';
